name: Lucene-solr-multi-request-handler
tagline: RequestHandler to run multiple queries in a batch (SOLR-1093)
body:
## Well, what's it all about?
A RequestHandler to run multiple queries in a batch. Please checkout [SOLR-1093] (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/SOLR-1093?focusedCommentId=13435940&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:comment-tabpanel#comment-13435940) for more specific details on the implementation. All credits goes to Karthick Duraisamy Soundararaj for the patch. 

> **Usage:** 
> To pass a parameter an individual query, it should be prefixed with the query number
> Eg. `1.q=query1&2.q=query2...`
> To pass a parameter to all queries, the prefix shouldnâ€™t be specified:
> Eg. `count=2&query="common_query"&1.mm=3&2.mm=2...`
>
>

***
Checkout the [github wiki](https://github.com/nicolaihald/lucene-solr-multi-request-handler/wiki/Instructions) where i've added a few more instructions.

     



### Apache Lucene/Solr Docs
